original_text: Then that person's body will become healthy again. He will be strong, like a young man. Then that person's body will become healthy again. He will be strong, like a young man. Then that person's body will become healthy again. He will be strong, like a young man. Then that person's body will become healthy again.
korean_text: 그런즉 그의 살이 청년보다 부드러워지며 젊음을 회복하리라

sentences.original_text: Then that person's body will become healthy again.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 그 사람의 몸이 다시 건강해질 것입니다.
